website_summaries.verdict: This curl-defining cream helps  to create curls with sleek definition and movement, while protecting against the drying effects of the sun.
pros: Helps define curls without making them crunchy
cons: Some have said the new formula doesn't smell as good as their old one

website_summaries.verdict: Garners enthusiasm among consumers with coarse hair and dense curls for the way it benefits their hair; but those with finer hair may find it too heavy.
pros: Formulated with plant oils and polymers that protect, moisturize, and leave curls soft and bouncy
Smells great and has a creamy consistency
Doesn't contain parabens, phthalates, or other potentially harmful or drying additives
cons: Feels heavy on fine, thin hair
The definition it gives curls doesn't last all day, especially in humid/wet weather

customer_reviews.title: New formula doesn't work to shape curls and smells awful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife who used the old formulation religiously for years. She says this new formula smells awful and doesn't provide any of the definition to shape curls - it makes her hair frizzy and doesn't work. So disappointed Bumble and Bumble decided to change a great product. She's looking for an alternative product for her hair now.
customer_reviews.author: OG

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Save yourself.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed that the formula for Bumble and Bumble Curl Cream has changed. I used it for at least 10 years and didn't realize the change until I paid $28 for this, opened it, and instead of the old familiar scent, I smelled something that I can only describe as "Yuck." Different formula, different scent. Won't use again. Won't buy again. Feeling ripped off by this company.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Lee

customer_reviews.title: I do not like this product for my Curley hair
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this product for my Curley hair. It's dosnt set the curl nice, weighs it down a little. I like the old product called Bumble and Bumble conscious curl creme for fine hair. I wish this product would come back. It's soo much better than the new product.
customer_reviews.author: Margarite P.

customer_reviews.title: Product does what it says; happy that I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I'd like this product but a friend recommended it. Well, it works great. I have naturally wavy hair and generally blow it out straight which is easy to do in the no-humidity climate I live in. But sometimes I just let my wet hair dry to damp and run this product through it and off I go. I hate messing with my hair. So now I can spend some time and wear it straight and other times just go out curly. May hair is jaw length.
customer_reviews.author: Clutter Hater

customer_reviews.title: no bueno
customer_reviews.text: Yikes, I am going to give this product another week but the first two days using it have been awful. My hair has been frizzier than when I use no product. I'm super sad because this was an expensive product. I was trying to find something better than what I use now which in Enjoy. Oh the agony of finding good products for curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Fabi

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's hair was unmanageable for years (mixed race hair), we tried everything, then tried this. For the first time ever, she said she loved her hair after using this product, and it looks amazing. I read a lot of reviews saying this formula isn't as good as whatever formula they had before, but from our experience with this "new" formula, I can say with 100% certainty that it works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha Omega Artist

customer_reviews.title: My Fave Curl Cream
customer_reviews.text: My hair is in between curly and wavy with a bit of volume. My friend gave me this product along with several others while cleaning out her closet and that's when I fell in love with this product, so I bought more! It makes my natural hair manageable. My hair doesn't feel weighed down and it's not greasy or sticky. On day 2 (since I don't wash my hair everyday), I can take a curling iron to it and it still continues to make my hair look and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia K

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally soft curls and this product did nothing but weigh them down and make my hair greasy. I don’t recommend it at all. The cream itself is very thick and no matter how little I’ve used, the end result has never been desirable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: This was highly recommend and I was shocked to see the cost.. but I bought it to use to define my curls... it wasn’t any better then Ausie products I already own... the bottle is compressed and looks squished.. not satisfied for almost $30.00..will not reorder... what makes it so expensive?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO NO
customer_reviews.text: Used the product for my hair on the advice of a friend. For my friend it works, not for me. Plan to give my bottle to her. Not the product's fault - my hair just doen't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Gingerbread

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Smells fine.
customer_reviews.text: Works for my fine hair. I really miss the old formula, but this is still better than all my other products on the shelf. The smell doesn’t bother me at all.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: 4b and bouncy
customer_reviews.text: This is, by far, my favorite curl definer. I have 4b natural hair and use this product on my first style after washing. It keeps my curls distinct throughout the week and I barely use any other products. It’s a bit pricey but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nina G.

customer_reviews.title: I feel like this just gave my hair a greasy coating--I find ...
customer_reviews.text: First off, the bottle came exploded with product everywhere. In addition, I feel like this just gave my hair a greasy coating--I find inexpensive mousse at Target works better. I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: I have tried everything from a little to alot and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried everything from a little to alot and my hair is always left greasy or wet looking.
customer_reviews.author: Loni

customer_reviews.title: Creme for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for myself but it didn't do anything. My hair is thin and straight with no real curl to it. I used it on my niece who has semi curly hair and it help define the curls. We used it her freshly washed her and let it air dry. Her hair was shiny, curly, but smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Best product I've found for my long thick curls.
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff. It tames frizz and shapes my long natural curls. It is the exact right weight for my hair but everyone is different. Definitely worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Melina C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying
customer_reviews.text: Really does enhance natural waves and curls, even good for straight hair
customer_reviews.author: M. Fearon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, it's great for my curly hair. I have naturally beach curls that I like to have together but hate the crusty gel finish. With this product it lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: RedShoes

customer_reviews.title: An Aveda hairdresser recommended this to me and I absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: An Aveda hairdresser recommended this to me and I absolutely love it. If you've got curly hair like me, I recommend using this along with R&B from Lush before drying your hair with a diffuser. Works absolute wonders. My hair is so much softer and my curls last even on 2 or 3 days without a wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best leave-in conditioner for thick, curly, dry hair
customer_reviews.text: I buy this product over and over because it is that good. I have long, thick, naturally spiral-curly hair. It reduces frizz yet keeps my hair soft-looking. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Redo

customer_reviews.title: Full of water - do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was half full of water, completely unusable and disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Scott

customer_reviews.title: best product on the market for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I'm a regular now. I like doing hair product rotations, and this is far better than anything I have used before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tested and Approved!
customer_reviews.text: It took me years of testing products on my curly hair, and this has been my go to product for the last 10 years! I use gel and this creme. You don’t need to use a lot, so it lasts me months. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Great product, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, however it came opened and 1/3 of the product spilled all over the packaging. Super bummed as it’s an expensive product and some of it went to waste.
customer_reviews.author: New customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware: Received a used product!
customer_reviews.text: The seal was open and the product was already used!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: hands down the best product ive ever used for my curls
customer_reviews.text: hands down the best product ive ever used for my curls. makes it easier to go days without washing to style for my 3c-4a hair. does not leave hair greasy or crunchy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have wavy hair and this holds a good amount of curl for my hair without being crunchy ...
customer_reviews.text: I have wavy hair and this holds a good amount of curl for my hair without being crunchy or weighing it down. Smells awesome.
customer_reviews.author: petersj3

customer_reviews.title: Love this product and brand !
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and brand ! It really works ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Kael8

customer_reviews.title: Great for after shower use - effects last 1 day
customer_reviews.text: I use this creme to help my digital perm curls look more defined. I apply it after I shower on damp hair. It works well and my hair looks wet for a good 3 hours when it usually takes 1 hour to dry. Day after shower, my curls are flatter again and I noticed my hair seems oiler too.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Styling cream for natural curls
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, holds beautiful natural waves on my longish hair
customer_reviews.author: teacher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for waves
customer_reviews.text: Letting my hair dry naturally causes a little fuzziness. With your Bumble and Bumble Curl Defining Creme, it looks so soft! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way to helping your hair shape up after a shampoo/blow dry.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it takes so little to get a nice result. My hair behaves with it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Love using this product in addition to my leave-in conditioner ...
customer_reviews.text: Love using this product in addition to my leave-in conditioner right before I use my diffuser. Doesn't make curls crunchy unless you use an excessive amount in one area. Overall, will probably buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chennell

customer_reviews.title: Still a good product
customer_reviews.text: I still like this product although the formula seems to have changed from the last time I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Skibig1

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: In the combination with other Bumble and Bumble products I really like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best curl cream I’ve ever bought!! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you want bouncy curls that look lively and have body this is the product
customer_reviews.author: ALb729

customer_reviews.title: fine and thin so the product is a big help
customer_reviews.text: My hair is soft, fine and thin so the product is a big help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the softness and hold of this product
customer_reviews.text: The only one I've ever used that didn't make my curls crispy. Love the softness and hold of this product!
customer_reviews.author: CaveFam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite curl product! Leaves your hair feeling soft and not crunchy at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good hold for bouncy curls
customer_reviews.text: A bit sticky, left residue on hands. Good hold for bouncy curls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: new formula is no good
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is terrible. It made my hair 3 shades darker than usual, did nothing for my curls, yet somehow also left my hair super tangled. I used to be a devoted B&B curl creme user but now that they've reformulated the product it's not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: California Mom

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS CURLY GIRLS
customer_reviews.text: This is the stuff to get if you have 2a-2c hair!!! I will recommend this product forever because of the beautiful finish it gives my natural curls. I recommend drying your hair with a microfiber towel out of the shower and leave it wrapped up for 30 min-1 hr and when you bring it down, scrunch the BB into your damp hair. LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Soft and nice
customer_reviews.text: I love the softness that this cream leaves. There is no stickiness unless you use too much and a little bit goes a long way. I have wavy, fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: BethG

customer_reviews.title: ... tips hey crunchy felling but I have friends that love it so must just be
customer_reviews.text: Just makes my hair Greasy no matter how little I put in doesn't really give me curls either more waves and I have a purm and my hair on the tips hey crunchy felling but I have friends that love it so must just be me
customer_reviews.author: bikecrazy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is fine, but I like the calming cream better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and keeps my curls curly all day :)
customer_reviews.author: Imani Bland

customer_reviews.title: Works well for coarse, curly hair
customer_reviews.text: This product works better than anything else I've tried for my coarse, curly hair. I prefer the old formula but this new formula works well. It's a little thicker than the old so I put a little water on my hands before putting it into my hair just to thin it a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: RobieL

customer_reviews.title: hoping like others they bring the old formula back
customer_reviews.text: ****PLEASE NOTE THIS NEW PRODUCT CONTAINS NUT OIL***** So not only did the product not perform, I had to wash my hair again when I got home because of the allergic reaction. So disappointing, hoping like others they bring the old formula back.
customer_reviews.author: Finbladez

customer_reviews.title: Not good for fine curls
customer_reviews.text: I have curly fine hair that is very thick. I was looking for a product to make my curls less tangled and frizzy but instead this project made my hair greasy. It's very thick and not good for fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: R H

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $ !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not all bumble and bumble products are created equal I've used a lot of their products some I like some I don't this one I absolutely love it has a great sent it doesn't have a greasy or oily feeling in your hair it defines curls but yet leaves them soft and touchable little on the expensive side but I don't mind paying a little bit more for a product that actually works!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I loved the old product and was hopeful this would work ...
customer_reviews.text: It simply does not do the job the old product did. If you have have course curly hair this doesn't mod the job. I loved the old product and was hopeful this would work but it just doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie phillips

customer_reviews.title: I do not like the smell of this cream at all
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the smell of this cream at all. The other curl cream by Bumble had a much better smell and was not as thick which worked much better for my soft curly head. This cream weighs your hair down.
customer_reviews.author: Tierney Salter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product... works best when I wash my hair at night and put this on before I go to bed (on wet hair). It defines my curls and almost completely eliminates my frizz. I have very curly unruly hair and this is by far the best product for defining and defrizzing
customer_reviews.author: S. TROUSLOT

customer_reviews.title: Light and Shine
customer_reviews.text: Love Bumble and Bumble. Had not used it for years and we recently reminded of it. Glad to be back. My hair is thin but has good body and wave. B&B does not weight it down and adds shine in the process. A win-win for me. And it's not heavily scented.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: I love this product my hair is so much smoother and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product my hair is so much smoother and easy to comb, I just wish it was a better price!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is a great styling product for hair with a bit of curl. The scent is very light. It makes my thinning short hair curl right up and gives it a bit of body.
customer_reviews.author: PennyCoffee

customer_reviews.title: Use with Bumble Primer for best reslts.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot It delivers as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Grossman

customer_reviews.title: 🤔🤔🤔
customer_reviews.text: Seems to make my hair funky. Like i used way to much but didnt. By the end of the day its oily and heavy. Kinda not sure about it.
customer_reviews.author: poe

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works great on curly hair. Need a VERY small amount.
customer_reviews.author: Keira Ranson

customer_reviews.title: Great hair gel cream
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my curly and frizzy hair. Keeps the frizz down. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Benest

customer_reviews.title: My curls turned to frizz
customer_reviews.text: It did not work for for curly hair! Left behind residue and did not hold my curls in humidity! It left my hair soft and frizzy!
customer_reviews.author: Dr Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great curl definition
customer_reviews.text: Gives great curl definition but does leave a film on your hair if you put too much in. I really like it for my beach wave hair along with a smoothing oil.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. Separated my curls. Leaves them soft, no frizz. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Penny Shaer

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: My hair curls less with this product than without it. My hair also feels oilier. It’s difficult to get it to come out of the bottle too.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Klosterman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but it is sometimes difficult to find.
customer_reviews.author: Lyra H Rider

customer_reviews.title: High quality product and it shows
customer_reviews.text: I am a Caucasian female and I have incredibly thick, curly hair. For the ladies with curly hair, I think it's safe to say it is difficult to find a styling product that does not make our hair thicker/bushy, frizzy, or shapeless. This is the first product I've used that is made for curly hair. I've never used a product that made my hair look as good as this stuff. This is a high-quality brand and it shows. I won't go back to anything else, even though this costs more than other products on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Greatest curly hair creme ever! I love the smell and it tames my curls perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Dye

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have not found the perfect curling cream as yet but I have used this for years and like it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Kess Evarts

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product for my hair, which is fine and wavy/curly, depending on how short it is. This creme helps keep frizz down and helps waves/curls to do their thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jan L.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great styling product for anyone with naturally curly hair
customer_reviews.text: This is a great styling product for anyone with naturally curly hair. It's not to heavy but it's enough to smooth the curl and frizz without making the curl a limp. Great product and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Who Dat⚜️

product_meta.title: Bumble and Bumble Curl Defining Creme for Unisex, 8.5 Ounce
product_meta.description: A curl defining cream with uv inhibitors that helps to create curls with sleek definition and movement. Its protect against the drying effects of the sun.
feature_bullets: A curl defining cream with uv inhibitors that helps to create curls with sleek definition and movement
Its protect against the drying effects of the sun
